wattwatt.interfaces.devices.schedulable

Interface ISchedulable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, IDevices, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IWashingMachine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SchedulableConnector, WashingMachineConnector, WashingMachineInPort, WashingMachineOutPort

    public interface ISchedulable
extends IDevices
    The interface ISchedulable

    Description

    Defines the interface for all our schedulable devices.

    Created on : 2020-01-27

    Author:

    Bah Thierno, Zheng Pascal
